Title: A Little RSS Reader
Description:
A Little RSS Reader is a really small software for read RSS feed on the internet.
We build it using VB.NET.

List for RSS are:

Kompas

Metro TV

and many otr

Ananditya

Information of Ma Chung University
HomeWiki:
A Little RSS Reader is a really small application for reading news feed on RSS.
Before that, what is RSS? RSS (originally RDF Site Summary, often dubbed Really Simple Syndication) is a family of web feed formats used to publish frequently updated works—such as blog entries, news headlines, audio, and video—in a standardized format. An RSS document (which is called a "feed", "web feed", or "channel") includes full or summarized text, plus metadata such as publishing dates and authorship.
This application is focus on Indonesian News RSS.
